channel.title: Joining others servers
channel.description:
Hi, im a n00b here and want to know how to use other peoples servers...
For example:
I went on the section of the forum were people advertise there servers and seen a PK-ing one, I like pking so I typed it in the address bar at the top of the page.
Nothing happend it just said something about it being unable to find.
The Ip I used was Pk-Scape.no-ip.org
Please tell me were to enter the IP.
...Thanks. :D

item.title: Joining others servers
item.dc:creator: @Pur3_Pwnag3 Pur3 Pwnag3
item.description:
@Pur3_Pwnag3 wrote:

It’s not a website it’s the actual ip adress. I thought it was a website at first too :p. But start up MoparScape and then on the login screen, look at the top left corner of the login screen. Click on file. Then click on new server. Then a box will pop-up saying “enter New Ip adress” enter what ever server you want and then login with any name and pass and enjoy :). Note: Some servers are down and will say Error Connecting to Server. Must be down. Click cancel and Start Server to make your own. But if you do that you will be by yourself. So if a server says that it’s down, you’ll have to pick a new one.

Read full topic
